strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_COMMANDO_GRANDMASTERY_DE: As Commando, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon or Harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_COMMANDO_RECOLORSKIN1_DE: As Commando, find the hidden Prismatic Crystal on Titanic Plains.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_COMMANDO_RECOLORSKIN2_DE: As Commando, find the hidden Prismatic Crystal on Commencement.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_COMMANDO_RECOLORSKIN3_DE: As Commando, find the hidden Prismatic Crystal on Sundered Grove.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_TOOLBOT_GRANDMASTERY_DES: As MUL-T, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon or Harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CROCO_GRANDMASTERY_DESC: As Acrid, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon or Harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CAPTAIN_GRANDMASTERY_DES: As Captain, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon or Harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_HUNTRESS_GRANDMASTERY_DE: As Huntress, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon or Harder.
